info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WITH TORRENTIAL RAINFALL WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL SWAIN COUNTY UNTIL 545 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm with torrential rainfall 15 miles north of Robbinsville, or near Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, moving north at 5 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
